charges.charge_description: 18:287.F  FALSE OR FRAUDULENT CLAIMS -- False, Fictitious, of Fraudulent Claims(1)

UNLAWFULLY, KNOWINGLY, AND INTENTIONALLY SUBMITTING A FALSE CLAIM TO THE U.S. GOVERNMENT FOR A DISASTER ASSISTANCE CLAIM BENEFIT FOR HURRICANE IKE IN EFFORTS TO RECEIVE RENTAL REIMBURSEMENT AT 201 COUNTRY DRIVE, WACO, TX., WHEN IN TRUTH AND IN FACT AT THE TIME THE REQUEST FOR ASSISTANCE WAS SUBMITTED AND SUBSEQUENTLY TO SUBMISSION, THE DOCUMENTS PRESENTED TO THE U.S. GOVERNMENT WERE FALSE, FRAUDULENT, AND FORGED, IN VIOLATION OF 18 USC 287.
